thread.section_title: OFX Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OFX | ofx.com
thread.title: Sam Blumenstein

author: Sam Blumenstein
title: Sam Blumenstein
text: Have already done an earlier glowing review several years ago. Nothing has changed except their communication throughout the process is now even better. Using OFX has saved us a fortune compared to traditional banks or other financial institutions and their on line process is so simple and fast. Transferring funds anywhere in the world with OFX changed from being an expensive painful task (through banks) to a simple money saving pleasure.
